description:
An award-winning ski touring pack that's tricked out, comfortable to carry and won’t weigh you down. With room for backcountry essentials and a little extra, the Tour 32 has ski and snowboard friendly features including multiple carry options, rear panel access and a dedicated avalanche tool pocket. The integrated helmet strap securely holds a helmet and can be stowed away in its own pocket for the ride down. Load lifting shoulder straps and the padded hipbelt evenly distributes weight so you can attack glorious steeps and playful pillows.

  • Awarded Gear of the Year from Backcountry Skiing Canada in their winter 2022/23 picks. They called it their “favourite ski touring pack to date.”
  • Made of durable 210-denier nylon with UHMWPE ripstop that is water resistant
  • Moulded EVA foam back panel and padded, curved shoulder straps carries the load comfortably
  • Padded hip belt provides additional comfort and has 2 zippered pockets for a ski strap, tools, or snacks
  • Top pocket contains a roll top collar into the main compartment and can expand/contract to create 10L of extra space for organization
  • Lid has a zippered accessory pocket
  • Front compartment has dedicated slots for your probe, shovel and snow saw
  • Zippered internal pocket has a key clip to secure your keys and ID
  • Side compression straps and A-frame style loops carry skis
  • Stowable webbing straps hold a snowboard or snowshoes and can be rigged for diagonal ski carry
  • Stowable helmet carry can easily deploy when needed
  • Stowable webbing loops hold ice axes or ski poles
  • Internal hydration sleeve lets you add your own reservoir (sold separately)
name: MEC Tour 32 Backpack
